actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to clarify that the S.S. United States may operate in the domestic and/or foreign commerce of the United States and between foreign ports.

summary.text: Stipulates that the steamship United States may operate in the domestic and foreign commerce of the United States and between foreign ports.

titles.title: A bill to clarify that the S.S. United States may operate in the domestic and/or foreign commerce of the United States and between foreign ports.
